At Health Questions I asked @MattHancock about the public health implications of the breaches at Walley's Quarry.

I know, from both the local GPs and those writing to me, that many residents are concerned for their health, both physically and mentally. @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/pwh6zUI4Zs

@StonebridgeLock @SaveLeaMarshes @EnvAgency @EnvAgencySE Ref: 1921960

tweets.text: @MonicaHone @SCLibDems @cam_friends @greenarteries @EnvAgency @RosieP4 The weight to be afforded to the NPPF is a matter for the discretion of the local planning authority. In this case, @SouthCambs obviously affords very little weight to the environmental provisions of the NPPF.
